channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Import all XML, CSV & TXT into WordPress
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Import all XML, CSV & TXT into WordPress

item.title: CVE-2022-3243|2024-08-03T01:00:10.864Z -- unknown -- import%20all%20xml%2C%20csv%20%26%20txt%20into%20wordpress
item.description: The Import all XML, CSV & TXT WordPress plugin before 6.5.8 does not properly sanitise and escape imported data before using them back SQL statements, leading to SQL injection exploitable by high privilege users such as admin

item.title: CVE-2022-3244|2024-08-03T01:00:10.691Z -- unknown -- import%20all%20xml%2C%20csv%20%26%20txt%20into%20wordpress
item.description: The Import all XML, CSV & TXT WordPress plugin before 6.5.8 does not have authorisation in some places, which could allow any authenticated users to access some of the plugin features if they manage to get the related nonce
